General.Name: Hua Jung Components Co Ltd
General.Description: Hua Jung Components Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells film capacitors in Taiwan. The company offers metallized polyester, metallized polypropylene, power film, and EMI suppression capacitors, as well as technology exchange related products. It serves customers in power supply and lighting markets. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
